thread.title: Thieves mug man, 79, make off with more than $1G in cash
thread.title_full: Thieves mug man, 79, make off with more than $1G in cash - NY Daily News

author: NEW YORK DAILY NEWS
title: Thieves mug man, 79, make off with more than $1G in cash
text:
© Gary Hershorn / Reuters/REUTERS A pedestrian walks past a line of New York Police Department (NYPD) cars parked at Times Square in New York, October 18, 2011. REUTERS/Gary Hershorn (UNITED STATES - Tags: SOCIETY TRANSPORT CRIME LAW) - RTR2STXR STOCK IMAGE Two crooks mugged a 79-year-old man in broad daylight in Brooklyn, one of them putting him in a chokehold and the other reaching into his pockets and coming away with a whopping $1,100, police said Wednesday.
The senior was robbed at about 4:25 p.m. Tuesday as he entered his building on Albemarle Rd. in Flatbush.
One of the men put him in a chokehold and pulled him to the ground while, the other got his hands on a cell phone and the wallet stuffed with cash.
The victim was treated for injuries on the scene. It wasn’t immediately clear why he had so much cash on him.
Police said they were investigating.
